module.name: Bulk Extensions
module.description: Bulk Extensions uses CSV files to import and export extensions.
module.changelog: *2.5.0.5* Add permit/deny fields provided by 4Colo. Fixed a small bug in table.csv. Fixed spelling error in template.csv. Added localization for table.csv. See CHANGES for how-to. *2.5.0.4* No changes, re-publishing to get md5sum and location info updated *2.5.0.3* Fixed bug - every notification email after the first one had increasing amounts of unwanted white space at the beginning of the message *2.5.0.2* New feature - Enforce extension range restrictions for admin users - thanks dinhtrung New feature - Email notification for new accounts *2.5.0.1* changed includes to include_once *2.5.0* Version for FreePBX 2.5 *0.2.1* Beta support for FreePBX 2.5 (unreleased) *0.2.0* New feature - Export Extensions Documented all supported Extension fields Minor code clean ups *0.1.1* Fixed bad path and error in tar file *0.1* First release
